title: Minecraft验证问题
author: lidarui
txt_content:
Logged in as lixiaorui | Log out

Confirm your identitySince you are logging in from this computer for the first time we need you to confirm your identity before you can continue. This is to make sure that your account isn't used without your authorization.
To confirm your identity, please answer the question below.
What was the name of your first stuffed animal?ProceedClueless?
Don't know the answer to the question? If you log in to your Mojang account you can request to reset your security questions.登陆后出现这个然后我点击忘了问题发送到邮箱后                Hello there, Rui!                            You've requested to change the secret questions for your Mojang account. To proceed, please click the following link:            https://account.mojang.com/me/settings/changeSecretQuestions/ff01ca5d7af8d8200ecfdda8faf66e3661c91e68                If you haven't requested to change your secret questions, someone else may have logged into your account without your permission. If you suspect this might have happened, please change your password to make sure your account is as secure as possible.                            Have a nice day,
                Mojang.
点进去还是叫我验证....我不知道是什么啊！！求解..

replies.author: lidarui
replies.txt_content: 现在的都已经错误次数过多啦.00.0.

replies.author: DanielCheung
replies.txt_content: 你打出那驗證問題，或許我可以幫你翻譯。。。

replies.author: lidarui
replies.txt_content: 我知道是什么意思，忘了答案..OK？ 他说可以重新设定答案，发到你的邮箱里，去重新设定的时候，却喊输入答案.....
